channel.description: ok theres items on my server like a certain item like lit bug laturn i weild it and it shows up as a sheild but its really a weapon so if i wear another sheild i have 2 sheilds and it says the lit bug laturn is a weapon but when i hold it its on my sheild side plz help[br][size=1]Posted on: September 28, 2007, 11:02:45 PM[/size][hr]nvm found out how myself
